channel.title: Delta 317 HELP PLZ!

item.title: Delta 317 HELP PLZ!
item.dc:creator: @xmonster xmonster
item.description:
@xmonster wrote:

ok heres my mute command i want it so that a mod lets say cant mute an admin how can i do this?

if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights >= 1) {try {String otherPName = command.substring(5);int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);if (otherPIndex != -1) {client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.muted = true;yell(" “+playerName+” has muted “+p.playerName+” ");writeLog(p.playerName, “mutes”);sM(“You have muted “+p.playerName+”!”);} else { sM(“The name doesnt exist.”); }} catch (Exception e) { sM(“Try entering a name you want to mute…”);}}

Read full topic
